basilmod:Rune.

cards.name: Due Date

Innate.
Can only be played if enemy is at full HP.

Exhaust.

cards.description:
Innate.

relics.name: Scholar's Notes
relics.description: At the start of combat, choose a card to add to your hand from your deck.
relics.flavorText: The deranged writings of a scholar well behind on his grant proposals.

relics.name: Endless Mug
relics.description: When you would gain [E] from Caffeine, gain [E] [E] instead.
relics.flavorText: Sleep is for people without infinite coffee.

relics.name: Trick Coin
relics.description: Fickle cards are 25% less likely to activate on heads, and 25% more likely to activate on tails. Right click to flip.
relics.flavorText: Who needs luck when you can cheat?

relics.name: Scholar's Thesis
relics.description:
Every 3 turns, choose a card to add to your hand from your deck.
Replaces Scholar's Notes.
relics.flavorText: I sure hope that angel got their degree.

potions.name: Coffee Potion
potions.description: Gain 1 Caffeine at the start of each turn.
